description: Precis is a young girl inventor from the town of Linga. She is a brilliant inventor capable of putting together contraptions very quickly, however they don`t always work the way she plans. She is good friends with a girl named Eleanor, who is inflicted with a fatal disease. To save her friend, Precis goes alone into an area of monsters to get the cure. Precis has a crush on Claude, whom she thinks of as her prince, and is blind to Ashton`s being in love with her.
name: Precis F. Newman
